History.name: The Pyramids of Giza
History.description: One of the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World, built over 4,500 years ago.
History.recommend: Go at sunrise for stunning views and fewer tourists.

Architecture.name: The Egyptian Museum
Architecture.description: Houses the world’s largest collection of ancient Egyptian artifacts, including King Tut’s treasures.
Architecture.recommend: Allocate half a day to explore.

Culture.name: Khan el-Khalili Bazaar
Culture.description: Historic market offering spices, gold, textiles, and traditional Egyptian crafts.
